snippet: China has no plans to implement a nationwide property tax this year, the spokeswoman for China's parliament said on Saturday, despite mounting expectations that such measures would soon be introduced to restrain surging property prices....

headline.main: China to Strengthen Defenses, No Word on Budget
headline.print_headline: China to Strengthen Defenses, No Word on Budget

lead_paragraph: China has no plans to implement a nationwide property tax this year, the spokeswoman for China's parliament said on Saturday, despite mounting expectations that such measures would soon be introduced to restrain surging property prices.
